about_the_game:
Squirrelmageddon! is a solo-developed action shooter focusing on movement, thinking fast, planning ahead and using the environment to complete mission goals... while being forever hunted by killer squirrels and infected AI robots with guns.

The squirrels have a 'random rhythm' to them and the best players learn how to 'dance with the squirrels' to escape the most crazy of scenarios or pull off an insane point scoring maneuver.

Squirrelmageddon! still regularly receives updates / new content / bug fix patches. Do let me know if you had a laugh / fun with the insanity that is Squirrelmageddon! (Check out the Demo!)

"Shooting them, despite their cuteness, is the only option..."
- Veteran soldier of the First War for Reclamation

Gameplay & Features

  • Killing mutant squirrels attracts larger squirrels... some of them explode... of course...
  • Mission system with objectives
  • 3rd / 1st person camera toggle hotkey
  • Weapon Mounted ADS
  • WRATH SYSTEM: failure results in squirrel mutations
  • Cooking, Crafting, Praying and Final Meal systems
  • KAWAII-AR4000 chipset to render squirrel cuteness
  • Glider movement as an arcade gameplay mechanic
  • Persistent moveable barricades, crates and other objects
  • Global high score leaderboards
  • Infected AI enemies with varying weapon types
  • A whole lotta flesh eating mutant squirrels!

ABOUT THE WEAPONS

  • 18 Weapons
  • Grenades and proximity mines
  • Moveable Turrets (single player)
  • Experimental 1st person weapon mounted ADS / Ironsight + Muzzle fire projectiles (not hit scan)
  • You will need to focus and learn your weapon's fine and gross points...
  • Some weapons are better in 3rd person - it's up to you how you play.
  • Weapon level ups affect reload speed, accuracy, bullet spread and damage.

    "Worship the squirrel... feel it's power!"
    - Brethren cult member

    HEALTH & WARNINGS

  • Playing this game may induce Sciurophobia in some players.
  • Playing this game may cure Sciurophobia in some players.
  • Playing this game does not mean you are psychotic - I asked.
  • Spending years making this game does mean I'm clinically repressed - I asked.

"I dine only upon the finest squirrel bits..."
- Elite hiver

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64bit
  • Processor: Intel® 5th Generation - i3-5010U or similar
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1050 / AMD RX580
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64bit
  • Processor: Intel® 6th Generation - i5 or similar
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1080 / AMD Radeon VII or better
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 10 GB available space

short_description: Squirrelmageddon! is an indie, dark humor, shooter for 1-4 players. In an apocalyptic future, genetically modified mutant squirrels roam the Earth as the new apex predator. Join the second War for Reclamation against the squirrel to reclaim the Earth.
